author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. To make the rhubarb, melt the butter in a small ovenproof frying pan over a medium heat. Add the rhubarb and the caster sugar, stir well and transfer to the oven to roast for 10-15 minutes, until the rhubarb has cooked through. To make the vanilla yoghurt, place the yoghurt together with the vanilla seeds into a small bowl and stir to combine. To serve, place the roasted rhubarb onto a plate with a dollop of the yoghurt alongside.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, softened,  2 sticks of rhubarb, cut into 5cm/2in lengths ,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  75g/2¾oz Greek yoghurt,  1 vanilla pod, split and seeds scraped out
